InstructionData.Title: gasgeneratorbatt
InstructionData.Author: Noob
InstructionData.Instructions:
define battery -1388288459 define generator 1165997963 define air -2087593337
alias powerpercent r3
lb powerpercent battery Ratio 0
main: blt powerpercent 0.20 genon bgt powerpercent 0.90 genoff yield j main
genon: sb generator On 1 sb air On 1 j main
genoff: sb generator On 0 sb air On 0 j main
